00001 #include "CDLMTracer.h"

00003 CDLMTracer::CDLMTracer()
00004 {
00005 }
00006 
00007 QString CDLMTracer::name() const
00008 {
00009     return QString("DLM");
00010 }
00011 
00012 bool CDLMTracer::checkSSS( const STreeNode *node, int depth ) const
00013 {
00014     if( depth == 0 || node->s_childList.count() == 0 )
00015         return true;
00016     
00017     if( node->s_childList.count() == 1 )
00018         return checkSSS( node->s_childList.first(), depth - 1 );
00019     
00020     return false;
00021 }
00022 
00023 float CDLMTracer::sssValue( const STreeNode *node, int depth ) const
00024 {
00025     if( depth == 0 || node->s_childList.count() == 0 )
00026         return node->s_value;
00027     
00028     return sssValue( node->s_childList.first(), depth - 1 );
00029 }
00030 
00031 STreeTrace * CDLMTracer::trace( const STreeNode *rootNode,
00032                                 int depth, int ) const
00033 {
00034     return trace( rootNode, depth );
00035 }
00036 
00037 STreeTrace * CDLMTracer::trace( const STreeNode *rootNode, int depth ) const
00038 {
00039     STreeTrace *newTrace = new STreeTrace;
00040     newTrace->s_aiName = name();
00041     newTrace->s_columnNames = QString("call|open|eval|value|best action,value").
00042                               split('|');
00043     
00044     if( rootNode == NULL )
00045         return newTrace;
00046     if( rootNode->s_childList.isEmpty() )
00047         return newTrace;
00048     
00049     newTrace->s_depths.append( new STreeCall() );
00050     traceCall( newTrace->s_depths[0], rootNode, depth, true );
00051     
00052     STreeCall *baseDepth = newTrace->s_depths[0];
00053     ((SDLMLine*)(*baseDepth)[0])->s_call = QString("DLM(%1,%2)")
00054                                            .arg(rootNode->s_name)
00055                                            .arg(depth);
00056     ((SDLMLine*)(baseDepth->s_lines.last()))->s_boxAction = true;
00057     ((SDLMLine*)(baseDepth->s_lines.last()))->s_boxValue = false;
00058     
00059     return newTrace;
00060 }
00061 
00062 void CDLMTracer::traceCall( STreeCall *call, const STreeNode *node,
00063                                int depth, bool max ) const
00064 {
00065     if( call == NULL || node == NULL )
00066         return;
00067 
00068     QString open;
00069     STreeNode *curNode;
00070     foreach( curNode, node->s_childList )
00071         open += curNode->s_name + " ";
00072     open = open.simplified();
00073     
00074     SDLMLine *curLine;
00075     QString bestAction;
00076     float bestValue = -1;
00077     bool better;
00078     foreach( curNode, node->s_childList )
00079     {
00080         curLine = new SDLMLine;
00081         
00082         curLine->s_open = open;
00083         curLine->s_eval = open.section( ' ', 0, 0 );
00084         open = open.section( ' ', 1, -1 );
00085         
00086         curLine->s_valueCall = max?"Min":"Max";
00087         curLine->s_valueCall += QString("V(%1,%2)")
00088                                 .arg(curNode->s_name)
00089                                 .arg(depth-1);
00090         if( curNode->s_childList.count() == 0 || depth == 1 )
00091         {
00092             curLine->s_valueValue = curNode->s_value;
00093             curLine->s_sss = false;
00094         }
00095         else if( checkSSS( curNode, depth - 1 ) )
00096         {
00097             curLine->s_valueValue = sssValue( curNode, depth - 1 );
00098             curLine->s_sss = true;
00099         }
00100         else
00101         {
00102             call->s_children.append( new STreeCall() );
00103             traceCall( call->s_children.last(), curNode, depth-1, !max );
00104             curLine->s_valueValue = call->s_children.last()->s_returnValue;
00105         }
00106         
00107         if( bestAction.isEmpty() )
00108             better = true;
00109         else
00110         {
00111             if( max )   better = (curLine->s_valueValue > bestValue );
00112             else        better = (curLine->s_valueValue < bestValue );
00113         }
00114         if( better )
00115         {
00116             bestAction = node->s_name + curNode->s_name;
00117             bestValue = curLine->s_valueValue;
00118         }
00119         curLine->s_bestAction = bestAction;
00120         curLine->s_bestValue = bestValue;
00121         
00122         call->s_lines.append( curLine );
00123     }
00124     
00125     call->s_returnValue = bestValue;
00126     ((SDLMLine*)call->s_lines.first())->s_call = 
00127         QString(max?"MaxV(%1)":"MinV(%1,%2)")
00128         .arg(node->s_name)
00129         .arg(depth);
00130     ((SDLMLine*)call->s_lines.last())->s_boxValue = true;
00131 }
00132 
00133 SDLMLine::SDLMLine()
00134 {
00135     s_call = QString();
00136     s_open = QString();
00137     s_eval = QString();
00138     
00139     s_valueCall = QString();
00140     s_valueValue = 0.0;
00141     s_sss = false;
00142     
00143     s_bestAction = QString();
00144     s_boxAction = false;
00145     s_bestValue = 0.0;
00146     s_boxValue = false;
00147 }
00148 
00149 SDLMLine::~SDLMLine()
00150 {
00151 }
00152 
00153 QString SDLMLine::operator [](int index)
00154 {
00155     QString ret;
00156     
00157     switch( index )
00158     {
00159     case 0: //  CALL
00160         ret = s_call;
00161         break;        
00162     case 1: //  OPEN
00163         ret = s_open;
00164         break;   
00165     case 2: //  EVAL
00166         ret = s_open.section(' ', 0, 0);
00167         break;   
00168     case 3: //  VALUE
00169         ret = s_valueCall;
00170         ret += "=" + QString::number( s_valueValue );
00171         if( s_sss )
00172             ret += " (SSS)";
00173         break;   
00174     case 4: //  BEST ACTION,VALUE
00175         if( s_boxAction )
00176             ret = QString("[%1], ").arg(s_bestAction);
00177         else
00178             ret = s_bestAction + ", ";
00179         if( s_boxValue )
00180             ret += QString("[%1]").arg(s_bestValue);
00181         else
00182             ret += QString::number(s_bestValue);
00183         break;   
00184     default:
00185         break;
00186     }
00187     
00188     return ret;
00189 }
00190 
00191 QStringList SDLMLine::toStringList()
00192 {
00193     QStringList ret;
00194     
00195     for( int i = 0; i < 5; ++i )
00196         ret += (*this)[i];
00197     
00198     return ret;
00199 }
